title: Tall Ḥamūkār
description: Tall Ḥamūkār is a large archaeological site located in the Jazira region of northeastern Syria close to the Iraqi border. The site may be one of the world's earliest urban centers. A place from the TAVO Index.

properties.description: Location based on OpenStreetMap, position based off of GeoHack. Coheres with position used in the CAST Corona Atlas & Referencing System.
properties.title: OSM location of Tall Ḥamūkār
